about_the_game:
Step into the epic and chaotic realm of Jarenara in: Battle Beat Arena, a turn-based strategy RPG with a rhythm twist! Test your humor, strategic thinking, and sense of rhythm. In a world where every decision and beat can mean the difference between victory and defeat—or just a good laugh.

Get ready to groove with over 100 earworms! From hip hop to metal, folk to pop, and even electro magic – we've got tunes to make your toes tap and your heart sing. Dive in and dance like nobody’s watching!

Key Features:

  • Turn-Based Strategy with a Beat: Engage in intense, tactical battles. Gather resources and build your town mid-battle. Make your moves to the beat for mighty damage multipliers. Think fast, or end up the village fool!

  • Playable Enemies: Experience the thrill of the hunt from both sides. Defeat enemies to unlock them as playable characters, adding depth and variety to your roster. Because who doesn’t want to be the bad guy sometimes?

  • High Difficulty: Face challenging opponents that will push your strategic skills and rhythm sense to the limit. Prepare for a test of your abilities, where only the most cunning, resourceful, and rhythmically inclined will win. Ready for a brain workout?

  • Unique Heroes: Choose from a diverse cast of heroes, each with a unique set of abilities and skills. Craft your perfect team and develop strategies tailored to their strengths. Remember, it’s not about the size of the hero in the fight, but the size of the fight—and rhythm—in the hero.

  • Six Factions: Align yourself with one of six distinct factions—Humans, Elves, Orcs, Undead, Techs, and Outsiders. Each faction offers unique units, abilities, and lore, providing endless tactical possibilities. Find your tribe, keep the beat, and wreak havoc!

  • Rhythmic Combat: In certain rounds, you must time your movements and abilities to the beat to achieve mighty damage multipliers. Dance your way to victory!

  • Build and Recruit:
    Gather gold from the battlefield and use it to construct formidable defenses and essential buildings. Recruit an array of minions mid-battle and send them into the fray to strengthen your position and overwhelm your enemies. Build, recruit, and conquer!

  • Level Up:
    Enhance your heroes by leveling up, carefully selecting items, and choosing abilities that best complement your strategy. Make each choice—and beat—count to dominate the battlefield. Who said you can't teach an old hero new tricks?

Prepare for a strategic experience unlike any other. Battle Beat Arena invites you to master the art of war, keep the rhythm, and uncover the secrets of a world on the brink of chaos.

- AND OF COURSE: THERE ARE ROMANCE OPTIONS!

Get ready to step into the arena. Will you restore balance, follow the order or plunge Jarenara into chaos?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Ready for a turn based strategy game with a rhythm twist? Battle Beat Arena combines the groove of rhythm games with the depth of turn-based strategy. Transform heroes into beasts, gather resources, build a base, and recruit monsters mid-battle. It's strategic gaming with a beat and a laugh!
